Linux Distributions that look and feel like MacOS


10 July, 2020

The Linux community makes very beautiful Linux distributions,for both the look and the feel, but MacOS has people who are paid to make their designs and stuff, so they have undeniabely beautiful looks and the feel is just great to say the least,

No, I havent been sold to the corporate lords yet, my point isthey have beautiful things and we want them
